## StoresInput type

Either a single [StoreInput](./tansu.storeinput.md) or a read-only array of at least one [StoreInput](./tansu.storeinput.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type StoresInput = StoreInput<any> | readonly [StoreInput<any>, ...StoreInput<any>[]];
```
